item.title: Supernatural, God & Religion
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: My Phases of Belief I was brought up in a devout Hindu household and very enthusiastically participated in the havans and poojas that happened often in the house. I had the prayers memorised and the Hindu pantheon was full of the most awesome gods that might put the superheroes of the Marvel and DC universe to shame. In short, I had a normal upbringing that any child born in a religious household has.
